pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quality Controlbased Robust LOESS Signal Correction // An R implementation of quality controlbased robust LOESS(local polynomial regression fitting) signal correction for metabolomics data analysis, described in Dunn, W., Broadhurst, D., Begley, P. et al. (2011) doi:10.1038/nprot.2011.335. The optimisation of LOESS's span parameter using generalized cross- validation (GCV) is provided as an option. In addition to signal correction, 'qcrlscR' includes some utility functions like batch shifting and data filtering.
